entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
